name: The Last Pascal
description:
This is just a playable version of the video I made for youtube

Controls

  • WASD - move
  • SHIFT - run
  • CTRL - crouch
  • Q - action/pick up box
  • SPACE - attack (you can only choke from behind)

P.S - there's no sound due to technical reasons which I don't want to fix at the moment ;)
